line_1: Nor Bath, nor Tunbridge, can my Lays inspire;
line_2: Nor radiant Beauty make me strike the Lyre:

line_1: Nor radiant Beauty make me strike the Lyre:
line_2: Nor Bath, nor Tunbridge, can my Lays inspire;

line_1: Far from the busy Croud I sit, forlorn;
line_2: And sigh in secret, and in Silence mourn:

line_1: And sigh in secret, and in Silence mourn:
line_2: Far from the busy Croud I sit, forlorn;

line_1: Nor can my Anguish ever find an End;
line_2: I weep a Father, and have lost a Friend.

line_1: I weep a Father, and have lost a Friend.
line_2: Nor can my Anguish ever find an End;
